description: As animals move across the desert, they leave tracks, diggings and droppings. For skilled trackers, reading these signs is like watching a movie. A story of who was there and what they were doing unfolds in front of them.
title: Reading desert sands—Indigenous wildlife tracking skills underpin vast monitoring project

description: A new study published in Nature Ecology & Evolution lifts the veil on what happens when octopuses and fish hunt together. As it turns out, this cross-species relationship is more complex than anyone expected.
title: Octopuses work together with fish to hunt—and the way they share decisions is surprisingly complex

description: The upcoming release of Disney's live action remake of "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs," currently scheduled for March 2025, has been surrounded by controversy—so much so that the film's trailer has received over 1 million dislikes on YouTube. In particular, many fans have taken umbrage with the fact that computer-generated imagery (CGI) will be used for the characters of the seven dwarfs, now renamed the "miners," rather than having them played by dwarf actors.
title: Why the changing representation of dwarfism in Disney's live action Snow White remake is so important

description: Growing up in Aberdeen, Scotland, the shadow of the Piper Alpha disaster loomed large over our community. The tragic explosion of the oil rig platform in 1988 claimed the lives of 167 people. Back then, I was blissfully unaware of the ecological ramifications of that disaster. But the spill of 670 tons of oil wreaked havoc on marine life and had a lasting impact on the marine environment that I love to explore.
title: Oil pollution in North Sea is 'grossly underestimated,' suggests new report

description: Earth's moon will soon have some company—a "mini moon."
title: Earth will have a temporary 'mini moon' for two months

description: Rescuers struggled on Saturday with washed-out bridges and debris-strewn roads in the search for survivors of devastating Storm Helene, which killed at least 63 people across five states and caused massive power outages.
title: More than 60 dead from storm Helene as rescue, cleanup efforts grow

description: Hurricane John, which made landfall twice on Mexico's Pacific coast, has now left eight people dead, all of them in southern Guerrero state, home to the beachside city of Acapulco, authorities said Saturday.
title: Death toll from Hurricane John hits eight in Mexico

description: Michael Ward—who has lived on Treasure Island, off Florida's Gulf coast, for 33 years—decided to ride out Hurricane Helene despite an order to evacuate. It was a decision he quickly regretted.
title: Florida island starts long clean-up after Hurricane Helene

description: By all accounts, Milagra the "miracle" California condor shouldn't be alive today.
title: A rare condor hatched and raised by foster parents in captivity now gets to live wild

description: Residents of Nepal's flood-hit capital returned to their mud-caked homes on Sunday to survey the wreckage of devastating floods that have killed at least 104 people across the Himalayan republic.
title: 104 dead in Nepal floods after relentless monsoon rains
